name: Classic Hacks
description: The good old tricks – simple, effective, and helpsome

hacks.title: Silent Body Double
hacks.description: Let someone else's presence carry you.
hacks.howto:
Work next to someone – in person or online (Pomodoro livestream, Discord, YouTube).

Your brain will think: 'We're working now.'

hacks.title: The Classic Pomodoro Clock
hacks.description: Stay focused with short bursts – and real breaks.
hacks.howto:
The Pomodoro technique is simple:
⏱️ 25 minutes of focused work
☕ 5-minute break
🔁 Repeat 4 times → Then take a longer break

It trains your brain to focus without burnout – and feels more doable than a giant task.

Make it your own:
🎧 Add your own music
🎮 Name each session like a quest
🧃 Treat yourself after each round!

hacks.title: Trick Your Brain with Choices
hacks.description: Give your brain a sense of free will instead of orders.
hacks.howto:
Create a 3-item menu:
🍽️ A) Something quick and easy
🎨 B) Something creative or cozy
📂 C) Something important, but doable

Asking 'What do I feel like doing?' gives a sense of control – and boosts motivation.

hacks.title: Fake Deadline
hacks.description: Use time pressure – without the stress.
hacks.howto:
Set a fake deadline before the real one.
⏰ 'I'll finish this by 15:00 – and then I get tea, snacks and 30 mins in the sun.'

Bonus: Tell a friend for accountability.

hacks.title: Make it 90% Easier
hacks.description: Start smaller than small.
hacks.howto:
Ask yourself:
👉 What’s the tiniest step I can do right now?
📄 Open the file?
✏️ Write one word?
🧠 Title the page?

Action creates momentum. Not the other way around.

hacks.title: The Public Timer
hacks.description: Make time pressure feel real – with a twist.
hacks.howto:
⏰ Set a Pomodoro timer
📱 Tell a friend: 'I'm working for 20 minutes now'
🎥 Or join a 'study with me' livestream

Your brain thinks it's a shared agreement – and that matters.

hacks.title: Start Ritual
hacks.description: Train your brain to recognize ‘work mode’.
hacks.howto:
Build a ritual that signals it’s time to begin:
🧃 A glass of juice
🎧 A specific playlist
📂 Opening a certain app or file

When your ritual starts, your brain follows.

hacks.title: Screenshot Your Progress
hacks.description: Use visual proof to stay motivated.
hacks.howto:
Every 20–30 minutes, take a screenshot of what you’ve done.
🖼️ Save it in a folder called 'Proof of Progress'
🎁 Watch your work grow – and feel proud.

hacks.title: Gentle To-do List
hacks.description: Write your to-do list like your best friend would.
hacks.howto:
Try this format: 'Hey darling, here are a few things you *might* try today 💛'

Use emojis, colors, and kind words. Ditch the bossy voice – unless that’s your vibe. (If so, check out the Dark Hacks 💀)

hacks.title: Joy-Starter
hacks.description: Start with the fun part – not the hard one.
hacks.howto:
Skip the struggle and begin with something you actually feel like doing:
🖊️ Dive into the creative bits
📸 Try a soft brainstorm
✅ Pick a task you can finish quickly

When joy leads the way, your brain slips into flow – and the rest will follow.

hacks.title: Reward Ritual
hacks.description: Task → Reward → Dopamine Party 🎉
hacks.howto:
Sprinkle rewards between your steps:
🥤 Iced coffee
💃 A dance break
🍪 A cozy snack
📱 One juicy reel

Make progress feel like a celebration – not a punishment!

hacks.title: Aesthetic Workspace Mode
hacks.description: Create a vibe your brain wants to stay in.
hacks.howto:
Turn your setup into a ritual:
🕯️ Light a candle
🎥 Play a 'study with me' video
🛋️ Add a soft blanket
🎶 Put on some lo-fi tunes

The more inviting it feels, the easier it is to begin.

extra.placeholder: How will you make your space cozy today?

hacks.title: Visual Victory Wall
hacks.description: Capture your wins and build digital confidence.
hacks.howto:
Make a folder – or use your notes app. Every time you do something awesome, add a screenshot, quote, or photo.

You’re collecting proof of your progress 💪

hacks.title: Future-You Letter
hacks.description: A gentle message to your tomorrow self.
hacks.howto:
Write something short and sweet:
✉️ 'Thank you for today. You showed up. That matters.'

Future-you will love you for it.

extra.placeholder: Write a message to yourself for tomorrow...

hacks.title: Make It Pleasurable Strategy
hacks.description: Make it so nice that you forget it’s 'work'.
hacks.howto:
Decorate your notes, eat something nice, use your favorite colors. Savor the process like a cozy hobby.

When it feels good, motivation sticks around.

name: Discipline Daddy Hacks
description: No feelings. Just focus. Just finish.

hacks.title: Boss Mode Timer
hacks.description: Forget Pomodoro. This is elite mode.
hacks.howto:
Set a structure:
⏱️ 45 min deep work
☕ 10 min break
🔁 Repeat x3
🛌 Big break after round 3

Set an alarm. No distractions. You’re in the zone.

hacks.title: Time Blocking Supreme
hacks.description: If it’s not scheduled, it doesn’t exist.
hacks.howto:
Plan your day with precision:
📅 What you’ll do
🕒 When you’ll do it
⏳ For how long

Add it to your calendar, give it colors, name it 'Operation Focus'. Become your own manager.

hacks.title: Eisenhower Matrix
hacks.description: Prioritize like a military strategist.
hacks.howto:
Quick-scan your tasks:
🔥 Urgent & important → Do now
🌱 Important but not urgent → Schedule
🚨 Urgent but not important → Delegate
🧹 Neither → Delete. Cold and clean.

No room for chaos. Only execution.

hacks.title: Bite the Frog
hacks.description: Start with the hardest task. Always.
hacks.howto:
Do the thing you dread first.
'If you must eat a frog, eat it in the morning.'

It clears your mind and builds discipline.

hacks.title: Brutal Accountability
hacks.description: Make it real – or pay the price.
hacks.howto:
Tell someone what you're doing today.
Set a deadline.
Send proof.
Get praise – or face shame 😌

Or write it like a pact: 'I will finish this today. Or do the dishes at 11 PM – with a toothbrush.'

hacks.title: Tracking is Power
hacks.description: You can’t improve what you don’t measure.
hacks.howto:
Track:
⏳ How long you worked
✅ What you completed
🧠 How you felt after

Make it a game: 'Can I beat yesterday’s score?'

hacks.title: Pay First, Play Later
hacks.description: Dopamine is a reward. Not a starter pack.
hacks.howto:
No fun until one task is done:
❌ No TikTok
❌ No snacks
❌ No scrolling

Finish one thing – then enjoy the hit 💥

hacks.title: The Ritual of Ready
hacks.description: Create a sacred launch sequence.
hacks.howto:
Before you start:
🧹 Clear your desk
🎧 Start focus music
💻 Only open what you need
📝 Write 'Let’s go' on a sticky note

Then: fingers on keys. No mercy. Just momentum.

name: Chaos Goblin Hacks
description: For chaotic brains with chaos hearts.

hacks.title: Chaos Combo
hacks.description: Multitask? No. Chaos-combo.
hacks.howto:
Pick 2–3 wildly different mini-tasks:
🧽 Start the dishwasher
✍️ Write an Insta caption
🏋️ 10 squats between sentences

Your brain thinks it’s wild – but you’re actually making micro-progress.

hacks.title: Task Shuffle
hacks.description: Let fate choose your to-do.
hacks.howto:
Write each task on a sticky note. Throw them in a bowl or a hat.
🎲 Pull one. Do it. Repeat.

Unpredictability = dopamine = goblin focus.

hacks.title: Dice of Destiny 🎲
hacks.description: Let the dice rule your fate.
hacks.howto:
Make a list of 6 tasks for today:
1️⃣ Answer emails
2️⃣ Pick up 5 things
3️⃣ 10 min of design
4️⃣ One boring task
5️⃣ Movement break
6️⃣ Fun/optional task

Roll the dice – and obey. 'The goblin gods have spoken.'

hacks.title: 7-Minute Brain Party
hacks.description: Like TikTok, but productive.
hacks.howto:
Set a timer for 7 minutes.
🚨 When it ends: take a break.
Then: new task, new 7 min.

It’s quick, chaotic – and somehow, things get done.

hacks.title: The Hat Hack
hacks.description: Become your goblin work-self.
hacks.howto:
Put on a 'work mode' item:
🎩 A silly hat
🕶️ Sunglasses
🧣 Big sweater
💄 Red lipstick

Now you’re *Boss Goblin You*. She has deadlines... and snacks.

hacks.title: Dopamine Menu
hacks.description: Press the fun button – after effort.
hacks.howto:
Make a list of rewards:
🎧 1 song
😹 3 minutes of memes
🐶 Pet the pet
🥤 Open a soda

But only *after* a task. Tap the dopamine like a vending machine.

hacks.title: Pretend You're a Character
hacks.description: Who are you today?
hacks.howto:
You're not you.
🧑‍🎤 You’re a rogue artist escaping capitalism
🤖 A robot assistant on a task mission
💻 A 90’s hacker with a funky soundtrack

Use a new voice. Narrate your moves. Step into character = step into flow.

hacks.title: The Chaos Route
hacks.description: When structure fails, flip the script.
hacks.howto:
Create a day of anti-routine:
❌ Plan nothing
🎲 Pull random tasks
📍 Change location every hour
🍳 Eat breakfast at dinner

When the world feels new, work feels like play.

name: Gentle Hacks
description: Soft motivation for tired brains and tender hearts.

hacks.title: The Gentle Letter
hacks.description: Talk to yourself like a friend would.
hacks.howto:
Write a note to yourself:
'Hey sweetie. I know today is hard. Let’s start soft. We'll do what matters – and if not, that's okay too. I'm proud of you just for being here.'

Read it aloud. Yes, it’s awkward. Yes, it helps. 😌

hacks.title: Low-Effort / High-Comfort List
hacks.description: Only soft, gentle tasks allowed.
hacks.howto:
Examples:
🫖 'Open the doc and just look at it'
🍵 'Make tea and breathe'
📝 'Plan without pressure'

Tiny steps count. You’re creating momentum with kindness.

hacks.title: Comfort Uniform
hacks.description: Dress for coziness – not performance.
hacks.howto:
Put on your softest clothes. Fuzzy socks. Warm drink. Candles. Lo-fi playlist.

You work best when you feel safe and warm 🧣🐻

hacks.title: Cozy Co-Working
hacks.description: You’re not alone – even when you are.
hacks.howto:
Try a livestream:
📺 'Study with me'
☕ 'Slow café ambience'
🏡 'Cozy productivity room'

It’s a community vibe, without leaving your blanket fort.

hacks.title: The Care Day Planner
hacks.description: Heart-first productivity.
hacks.howto:
Ask: 'What would feel *good* for me today?'
Include:
💆‍♀️ Self-care (food, rest, peace)
⏳ Micro-focus (short, kind work)
🎁 Reward (comforting treats)

It still counts – it just starts with love.

hacks.title: Tiny Moves & Sensory Start
hacks.description: Begin the day without pressure.
hacks.howto:
Try this:
🛏️ Make your bed
🌬️ 3 deep breaths
🌸 A scent you love (lavender, citrus...)

Let your senses lead the way before your brain even boots up.

hacks.title: The ‘That’s Still Something’ Rule
hacks.description: Everything counts. Everything.
hacks.howto:
Opened your laptop? That’s something.
Thought about a task? That’s something.
Sat down, ready-ish? That’s definitely something.

You’re allowed to cheer for that. It’s enough today 💞

name: Dark Hacks
description: Existential panic and raw truths as motivation... 👀

hacks.title: Memento Mori Method
hacks.description: You will die. Let that sink in.
hacks.howto:
Ask yourself:
'Is this how I want to spend the only life I get?'

Write 'Memento Mori' on post-its in gothic font. Stick them everywhere. It’s haunting – and effective.

hacks.title: Time is Running Out
hacks.description: Turn on a dramatic countdown.
hacks.howto:
Use a death-clock app or intense timer.
🎵 Add classical music or dystopian sci-fi ambience.
Tell yourself: 'You have 45 minutes left. Use them wisely.'

hacks.title: Parallel Universe Version
hacks.description: Channel the version of you who already did it.
hacks.howto:
Imagine the you who followed through.
They made it happen. They changed their life.
Ask: 'What would they do right now?'
Now go do it – for them. Not for you.

hacks.title: The Cold Truth Session
hacks.description: Look the consequences in the eye.
hacks.howto:
Ask yourself:
- What happens if I never do this?
- What will I miss out on?
- Who do I become if I never start?
Write it down. Stare at it. Let it haunt you until inaction becomes unbearable.

hacks.title: Villain Arc Activation
hacks.description: Unleash your inner anti-hero.
hacks.howto:
'People think I’m lazy? WATCH ME.'
Put on dark music. Brew vengeance-coffee. Plan your day like a tactical strike.
Do it for the drama. For the aesthetic. For the glorious revenge arc.

hacks.title: The Gravestone Ritual
hacks.description: Finish the task to honour your fallen self.
hacks.howto:
Write your name + task on an imaginary gravestone.
Complete it in memory of the version of you who didn’t make it.

hacks.title: Abyss Motivation
hacks.description: Let the weight of time move you.
hacks.howto:
Reflect:
- How fast time moves
- What’s truly at stake
- What you’ll regret if you don’t act today

Then act – so Future You says: 'Thank god I did it,' not: 'Why the hell didn’t I?'

name: Gamified Hacks
description: For those who live for levels, lore and loot.

hacks.title: Daily Quest Scroll
hacks.description: Each day is a new campaign.
hacks.howto:
Start your day by writing 1–3 quests:
📜 'Open the portal (aka open the doc)'
⚔️ 'Battle the admin beast (emails)'
💎 'Recover lost artifact (old notes)'

Name them. Frame them. Slay them.

hacks.title: Mini-Boss Battles
hacks.description: Every hard task is a dragon to slay.
hacks.howto:
Pick your hardest task today – that’s your boss fight.
Start a 25 min battle.
💥 Use full focus.
🏆 Reward: potion (snack), victory dance, rest.

hacks.title: Equip Before Battle
hacks.description: Prepare your tools like a real adventurer.
hacks.howto:
Gear up with:
🎧 Headphones (sound magic)
📓 Notebook (spellbook)
🧪 Elixir (coffee/tea)
💡 Atmosphere (vibe lighting)

When equipped, you’re in character.

hacks.title: Bonus Quests & Side Missions
hacks.description: Little wins = big momentum.
hacks.howto:
Examples:
🪴 Water plants
💌 Send kind message
🗂️ Sort your desk

Add XP, gain confidence, feel cozy.

hacks.title: Glitch Awareness Protocol
hacks.description: You’re inside the code.
hacks.howto:
Sit down and tell yourself:
'Everything is a simulation. I write code with every action.'
You are bending the system.
You are awake. 👁️

hacks.title: Operator Mode
hacks.description: Rebel from inside the system.
hacks.howto:
💾 Boot sequence:
1. Turn on screen
2. Open document
3. Ask: 'What would the real me do now?'
Type. Act. Override the hesitation algorithm.

hacks.title: Skill Tree Tracker
hacks.description: Track your progress like a true RPG hero.
hacks.howto:
Make a skill tree:
🧠 '10 min focus'
😤 'Do something uncomfortable'
📐 'Make structure'
Each completed node = upgrade unlocked.

hacks.title: Debug Mode
hacks.description: If it’s not working, it's not you. It's the system.
hacks.howto:
Ask:
🛠️ Is the plan broken?
🔋 Am I low on sleep, food, energy?
🧹 Is the visual clutter blocking me?

Patch it. Try again. You are not the bug.

hacks.title: Red Pill Routine
hacks.description: Wake up from the scroll illusion.
hacks.howto:
Each morning, choose:
🔵 Blue pill = autopilot, escape, scroll
🔴 Red pill = agency, focus, action
You choose. You always choose.

hacks.title: Enchanted Notes
hacks.description: Add magic to your workspace.
hacks.howto:
Make your notes look like spell scrolls:
🌟 Use colors, flourishes, symbols
📖 Title your to-dos like quests: 'Defeat Inbox Dragon'
🎨 Bonus: draw progress runes in the margins.

hacks.title: Level-Up Reflection
hacks.description: Look back – and gain XP.
hacks.howto:
End of day:
🪞 'What did I complete?'
🧠 'What skill did I train?'
🎁 'What reward did I earn?'

Acknowledge your growth. Log it like a hero journal.

hacks.title: Why Ritual
hacks.description: Ask yourself why – before you begin.
hacks.howto:
Take 1–2 minutes and ask:
'Why does this matter to me?'
'How does it connect to the person I want to become?'

Let the answer light a fire within you – not just an external obligation 🔥

hacks.title: Journaling to the Core
hacks.description: Write your way to clarity and calm.
hacks.howto:
Set a timer for 5 minutes. Reflect:
🖊️ 'What would it mean to succeed at this?'
😟 'What fear is leading me right now?'
💗 'What would the most self-loving version of me do today?'

Write freely. Let the truth guide you.

hacks.title: Mindful Breathing (2-Min Hack)
hacks.description: Start from presence, not pressure.
hacks.howto:
Close your eyes.
Inhale 4 sec → Hold 4 sec → Exhale 6 sec.
Repeat for 2 minutes.

Think: 'I’m here. I’m starting. That’s enough.'

hacks.title: Intention Before Action
hacks.description: Let a sentence guide your session.
hacks.howto:
Write one sentence:
🧭 'Today, I’ll work with focus and self-respect.'
🌱 'I don’t need to do everything – just take a step.'
💡 'I choose to be present.'

Stick it to your screen or hand. Let it lead instead of your to-do tyrant.

hacks.title: Fear or Resistance?
hacks.description: Understand what’s holding you back.
hacks.howto:
Ask yourself:
'Is this fear or just resistance?'
Fear = self-doubt, perfectionism, identity
Resistance = boredom, fatigue, overwhelm

Once you name it, you can meet it honestly – and move gently forward.

hacks.title: Life Zoom-Out
hacks.description: Consult your future self.
hacks.howto:
Imagine your future self, 10 years ahead, looking back at today:
💭 'What would they wish I did?'
💖 'What would make them proud?'

Write that. Then do one tiny thing in that direction.

hacks.title: Just Being Here Is Enough
hacks.description: The most radical hack of all.
hacks.howto:
You are already worthy – before doing anything.
Anything you do today is just a beautiful bonus to your existence 💗
